name: connecX
0:
”Alexa ask my connecX to tell me the building news”
”Alexa ask my connecX to book a facility”
”Alexa ask my connecX to report a fault”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my connecx
des:
This skill connects Alexa with the connecX building management platform to provide voice control of your building services.

Notice: To use this Skill you need to have an active connecX account.

connecX provides:
 - Booking of Shared Building Facilities
 - Building News
 - Interaction with Building Management Services
